detail_desc: Set with a vest top and matching shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Blouse in woven fabric with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar, buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Fully lined V-neck, backless swimsuit with lace details at the top, ties at the back of the neck and padded cups with removable inserts.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a zipped pocket in woven fabric on one sleeve, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumpsuit in a patterned weave with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and straight, wide legs. Smocking on the shoulders, at the cuffs and around the waist.
Batik-patterned shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves and narrow cuffs with a press-stud fastening.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Necklace in shiny metal with large chain links and an adjustable fastening. The zinc content of the necklace is recycled.
Mules with open toes, faux fur crossover straps at the top, imitation suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Ankle boots in suede with loops at the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Rib-knit jumper in soft chenille yarn with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and slim legs.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Lightly padded fancy dress costume in the shape of a popcorn box with a hook and loop fastener at the top. Supplied with a lightly padded hat with a hook and loop fastener at the back.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and metal front fastenings.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in smocked cotton jersey with short sleeves. Small, overlocked frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft jersey.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey, and a pair of braces. T-shirt with buttons on one shoulder, a chest pocket with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a decorative button. Side pockets with a decorative flap, a fake welt back pocket with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the front and back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky trainer soles.
Kimono jacket in woven fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine-knit mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a fleece-lined drawstring hood and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, flap front pockets with a press-stud and a side pocket on the outside, and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and a fastening with two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Short top in glittery jersey with a wrapover detail at the front and long sleeves.
Jacquard-patterned socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and a concealed zip and button at the back. Lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif and ribbed neckline.
Slides with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Studio Collection. Flip-flops in recycled polyester with padded foot straps and ties that can be fastened around the ankles. Soles made from BLOOM™ algae foam. BLOOM™ is a foam material made partly from algae biomass. The innovative manufacturing process used for this material helps to clean and restore the environment.

Long jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, decorative shoulder tabs and a zip and wind flap down the front. Chest pockets and front pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, a drawstring hem and a single back vent. Rounded and longer at the back. Unlined.
Belt in imitation leather with a perforated pattern and metal buckle. Width 2.7 cm.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a draped front and back and a seam at the waist with a flare to the hem.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and pockets with a button at the back. Adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details that can be unbuttoned and removed.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Deep V-neck, concealed buttons down the front, and long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seams under the bust and at the hips for added width. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey made from a viscose blend with a racer back. Cut-out section at the back and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.

Short lace dress with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Small backpack in cotton canvass with an appliqué on the front, a zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined. Size 9x22x30 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a high, elasticated shaft, pointed toes and covered heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Derby shoes with decorative welt seams and open lacing at the front. Rubber soles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with sewn-in creases down the front and a zip and concealed button at the side. Skinny fit through the hip, thigh and leg. Easy pull-on elasticated waist.
Fully lined, one-shoulder bikini top with a wide, sturdy flounce at the top that goes over one shoulder.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
Viscose satin top with shoulder pads, press-studs at the neck and long sleeves with a concealed zip at the cuffs.
T-shirt in linen jersey with a boat neck, lapped shoulders and slits in the sides of the hem.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap welt front pockets. Lined.

Padded satin bomber jacket with an embroidered motif front and back and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Cardigan in soft, pattern-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Rectangular sunglasses with chunky plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
3/4-length leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Jumper in a soft, loose, rib-knit wool blend with ribbing around the neckline and long raglan sleeves with wide foldover ribbing at the cuffs.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Brushed inside.
Handbag in soft, grained imitation leather with rows of fringing on the front, a handle, zip at the top and narrow shoulder strap. Lined. Size approx. 8.5x28x32 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and straight hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Fleece gloves with ribbed cuffs.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with a lace trim at the top, wide sides, a lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the top, short butterfly sleeves and short legs. Press-studs at the shoulders and crotch.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Large round stud earrings in embossed metal. Diameter 3 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and welt back pockets.
Short chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
Fitted V-neck dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a neckline with crossover ties at the back, and buttons down the front. Lined at the top.
Cotton cap with broderie anglaise, an embroidered appliqué and adjustable ties at the back.
